id.description: The unique identifier of the ad.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the ad was last updated.

created_at.description: The date and time when the ad was created.

name.description: The name or title of the ad.

ad_squad_id.description: The unique identifier of the ad squad this ad belongs to.

creative_id.description: The unique identifier of the creative content used in the ad.

status.description: The current status of the ad.

type.description: The type or category of the ad.

render_type.description: The type of rendering used for the ad.

review_status.description: The review status of the ad.

review_status_reasons.description: Reasons for the review status of the ad.

delivery_status.description: The delivery status of the ad.
